useCase.name: User Research Participant Selection
useCase.description: Use case for selecting NSF participants for interviews

preconditions.precondition: User Researcher needs to have access to the User Research Management System
User Researcher needs to have a list of potential participants

successEndConditions.condition: NSF participants are successfully selected for interviews

failureEndConditions.condition: No suitable NSF participants are found

useCase.trigger: User Researcher initiates the participant selection process

mainSequence.step: User Researcher searches for potential participants based on interview topic
User Research Management System queries NSF Staff Database for staff with relevant expertise
NSF Staff Database returns a list of potential NSF participants
User Research Management System presents potential participants to User Researcher
User Researcher selects NSF participants for interviews
User Research Management System sends invitation emails with interview details via Email System
User Research Management System confirms NSF participant RSVPs
